author: Peter K. Norquest
notes: Norquest, Peter K. A Phonological Reconstruction of Proto-Hlai. Ph.D dissertation. Department of Anthropology, University of Arizona, 2007.Cognacy judgments are based from Norquest's lists of Proto-Hlai / Proto-Austronesian comparisons.
problems: Proto-Greater Hlai, Proto-Central Hlai, etc. are given when there is no Proto-Hlai form.
